name: cantab
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
abbreviation for Cambridge: used after someone's name and qualifications to show that they have a degree from Cambridge University: Miss G. Grower, B. A. (Cantab) (= she has a Bachelor of Arts degree from Cambridge)
